00010 #pragma once
00011 #include "socket/ConstBuffer.h"
00012 #include "socket/ReceiveEvent.h"
00013 #include <boost/detail/endian.hpp>
00014 
00015 namespace sevent
00016 {
00017     namespace endiansafe
00018     {
00019         enum Endianess {
00020             SEVENT_LITTLE_ENDIAN = 1, // Need to prefix because [LITTLE|BIG]_ENDIAN is a non-namespaced global on some systems.
00021             SEVENT_BIG_ENDIAN = 2,
00022             SEVENT_MIDDLE_ENDIAN = 3
00023         };
00024 
00025 
00026 #ifdef BOOST_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00027             static uint8_t my_endianess = SEVENT_LITTLE_ENDIAN;
00028 #elif BOOST_BIG_ENDIAN
00029             static uint8_t my_endianess = SEVENT_BIG_ENDIAN;
00030 #elif BOOST_PDP_ENDIAN
00031             static uint8_t my_endianess = SEVENT_MIDDLE_ENDIAN;
00032 #else
00033 #error "Unsupported endianess detected."
00034 #endif
00035 
00037         inline Endianess myEndianess()
00038         {
00039             return (Endianess)my_endianess;
00040         }
00041 
00042 
00043 
00044 
00045         static void endianCheck(Endianess endianess)
00046         {
00047             if(!myEndianess() == endianess)
00048             {
00049                 throw new std::runtime_error("We currently do not support endian-decoding.");
00050             }
00051         }
00052 
00054         template<typename T>
00055         socket::MutableBuffer_ptr decode(socket::MutableBuffer_ptr buf,
00056                                          Endianess endianess)
00057         {
00058             endianCheck(endianess);
00059             return buf;
00060         }
00061 
00062 
00066         template<typename T>
00067         void pushBack(socket::ConstBufferVector& vec, T* data, unsigned numElements)
00068         {
00069             vec.push_back(socket::ConstBuffer((char*)&my_endianess, 1));
00070             vec.push_back( socket::ConstBuffer(data, numElements*sizeof(T)) );
00071         }
00072 
00076         template<typename T> // TODO: partial template specialization!
00077         socket::MutableBuffer_ptr popBackAndDecode(socket::ReceiveEvent& event)
00078         {
00079             socket::MutableBuffer_ptr buf = event.popBack();
00080             Endianess endianess = *(event.popBack()->data<Endianess>());
00081             return decode<T>(buf, endianess);
00082         }
